info.name: Campaign All Need A Post API Payload Examples
info.description: Postman collection payload examples for CampaignAllneedaPost endpoints

item.name: Create Campaign All Need A Post - Full Payload

body.raw:
{
  "business_Branch_id": 1,
  "Post": [
    {
      "Picture": "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
      "Video": "https://example.com/video1.mp4",
      "Live": "https://example.com/live1"
    },
    {
      "Picture": "https://example.com/image2.jpg",
      "Video": "",
      "Live": ""
    }
  ],
  "Caption": "Check out our amazing new products! #sale #discount",
  "Tag": ["#sale", "#discount", "#newarrivals", "#fashion"],
  "Music": ["Song Title 1", "Song Title 2"],
  "Description": "This campaign showcases our latest collection with amazing discounts and offers. Don't miss out!",
  "CompaingName": "Summer Sale 2024",
  "CompaingnType": "Promotional Campaign",
  "TargetCustomer": "Age 18-45, Fashion enthusiasts, Online shoppers",
  "Region_city": "New York, Los Angeles, Chicago",
  "PromoCode": "SUMMER2024",
  "CallToActivelink": "https://example.com/shop-now",
  "Status": true
}

request.description:
Create a new campaign post with all fields including the new optional fields.

**All Fields (all optional except business_Branch_id if not authenticated):**
- `business_Branch_id` (Number, optional): Business branch ID
- `Post` (Array of Objects, optional): Array of post entries with Picture, Video, Live
- `Caption` (String, optional): Campaign caption (max 500 chars)
- `Tag` (Array of Strings, optional): Hashtags or tags
- `Music` (Array of Strings, optional): Music tracks
- `Description` (String, optional): Campaign description (max 2000 chars)
- `CompaingName` (String, optional): Campaign name (max 200 chars)
- `CompaingnType` (String, optional): Campaign type (max 100 chars)
- `TargetCustomer` (String, optional): Target customer description (max 500 chars)
- `Region_city` (String, optional): Target regions/cities (max 200 chars)
- `PromoCode` (String, optional): Promotional code (max 50 chars)
- `CallToActivelink` (String, optional): Call to action URL (max 500 chars, must be valid URI)
- `Status` (Boolean, optional): Status flag (default: true)

item.name: Create Campaign All Need A Post - Minimal Payload

request.description: Create a campaign post with minimal required fields. business_Branch_id will be auto-detected from authenticated user if not provided.

item.name: Create Campaign All Need A Post - With New Fields Only

body.raw:
{
  "Caption": "Special Promotion Campaign",
  "CompaingName": "Black Friday Sale",
  "CompaingnType": "Seasonal Sale",
  "TargetCustomer": "All customers interested in electronics and gadgets",
  "Region_city": "Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore",
  "PromoCode": "BF2024",
  "CallToActivelink": "https://example.com/blackfriday",
  "Description": "Huge discounts on all products this Black Friday!",
  "Status": true
}

request.description: Example showing all the newly added optional fields.

item.name: Update Campaign All Need A Post - Update New Fields

body.raw:
{
  "CompaingName": "Updated Campaign Name",
  "CompaingnType": "Updated Campaign Type",
  "TargetCustomer": "Updated target: Young professionals aged 25-40",
  "Region_city": "Updated: London, Paris, Berlin",
  "PromoCode": "UPDATED2024",
  "CallToActivelink": "https://example.com/updated-link",
  "Description": "Updated campaign description with new information."
}

request.description: Update campaign post with new optional fields. All fields in the body are optional, but at least one field must be provided.

item.name: Get All Campaign All Need A Posts - With Search

query.description: Search in Caption, Description, Tag, Music, CompaingName, CompaingnType, TargetCustomer, Region_city, PromoCode

request.description: Get all campaign posts with search. The search parameter now searches in all fields including the new optional fields (CompaingName, CompaingnType, TargetCustomer, Region_city, PromoCode).

item.name: Get Campaign All Need A Post By ID

request.description: Get a single campaign post by ID. Returns all fields including the new optional fields.

item.name: Delete Campaign All Need A Post

request.description: Soft delete a campaign post by setting Status to false.

item.name: Get Campaign All Need A Posts By Auth

request.description: Get all campaign posts created by the authenticated user. Search includes all fields including new optional fields.
